# cloudtemple_iam_company (Data Source)

To query this datasource you will need the `iam_read` role.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Read a company
data "cloudtemple_iam_company" "foo" {
  id = "77a7d0a7-768d-4688-8c32-5fc539c5a859"
}
```
